name: Buqikma Lash Shampoo - 60ML Lash Cleanser with Fan Brush, Rinse Bottle and 50 Pcs Mascara Brush, Rich Foam Wash for Eyelash Extensions at Home (Pink)
short_description: 【Lash Shampoo for Eyelash Extention】Buqikma lash cleaning kit includes 1pc 2.11floz(60ml) large capacity eyelash extension shampoo,1pcs portable USB lash fan dryer,1 pc soft fan brush,50pcs mascara brush,1pc 150ml washing bottle.A variety of accessories to meet all your daily needs of keeping your eyelashes perfectly clean.Help you clean your eyelashes quickly and effectively.

【Rechargeable Eyelash Fan Dryer】This lash extension care kit for eyelash extensions is designed without blades,is safe enough and the built-in cooling system can blow out cold air to help the glue grafted eyelashes dry quickly.A T-shaped bracket on the back can make it stand on the table. The air conditioning fan is compact in size and light in weight,easy to carry and store.Eyelash fan will help you clean your eyelashes faster and easier.

【Natural Safety Lash Extensions Shampoo】Our lash extension cleanser is manufactured with Water 90%,Sodium chloride 5%,1,3-Propanediol 3.5%,Sodium dodecyl sulfate 1%,Sodium benzoate 0.5%.No pigment,no color,no stimulation,no mineral oil,no paraben,no alcohol,no polyquaternium.Buqikma lash shampoo can thoroughly clean tne grease and dirt of the eyelashes.This eyelash shampoo will not damage eyelashes,and enhance the durability of grafted eyelashes.

【Gentle Deep Remover】lash care kit for eyelash extensions will help remove all the dirt,dust,oil,and excess makeup from your lashes after a busy daily life. The dirt and makeup residue that builds up around your eyes can damage your precious lash extensions.Lash extension kit will make your lashes look fresher.Extends the life of natural and artificial false eyelashes. This lash cleanser for extensions is suitable for salon beauty and home use.Provide you with professional eyelash care.

【Super Easy to Use 】First, press the mouth of the bottle and squeeze out a mount of eye lash cleaner foam. Then use the soft brush and rub forward along the direction of the lash growth.Next,rinse with water and wipe off the foam with a cotton pad,dry your eyelashes with a fan,and comb your eyelash with a mascara brush.Now,lash shampoo helps you own clean comfortable eyelashes.

Make NOVEHA Lavender and Tea Tree Eyelid Foaming Cleanser a part of your daily eye care routine for lasting comfort and relief.
